snippet.title: Slashy Hero - iPhone, iPad, Android - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Come visit our Facebook page for more info:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Slashy-Hero/1438770926418863?pnref=story

Slashy Hero is an isometric action game on iOS and Android devices coming Halloween 2015!

A great evil has stolen all the sweets for Halloween! Its down to you to reclaim all the sweets and save the day! Battle through an epic mansion filled with monsters and traps as you strive to become the Slashy Hero!

For iOS iPhone, iPad and Android devices!

We also have a press kit/website too:
http://gentlebrosgames.wix.com/slashyhero

Music by Tatsuya Naiki.

EDIT: We apologize for the typo, our trailer artist was most probably drunk and tired. It's 'Costumes Galore'!
